name: soinech-chat
description: Full-stack real-time chat application with offline message support

scripts.build: npm install --prefix soinech_chat_backend && npm install --prefix soinech_chat_frontend && npm run build --prefix soinech_chat_frontend
scripts.start: npm install --prefix soinech_chat_backend && npm run start --prefix soinech_chat_backend
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix soinech_chat_backend" "npm start --prefix soinech_chat_frontend"
scripts.install:all: npm install --prefix soinech_chat_backend && npm install --prefix soinech_chat_frontend
